XXn2890u_001:3081: viṣa nāmantrita yadvad bhakṣaṇād āyuṣaḥ kṣayaḥ ||
XXn2890u_001:3085: tad eva mantrita kṛtvā sukham āyuś ca vardhate |
XXn2890u_001:3092: atha tasmin kṣaṇe devī prajñāpāramitā varā ||
XXn2890u_001:3111: yadi brahamaśata hanyāt sāpi pāpair na
XXn2890u_001:3120: mārayen matsyapakṣīñ ca yoginī na ca lipyate ||
XXn2890u_001:3128: striyaḥ sarvā hi prāyeṇa tāsām arthe prakāśita ||
XXn2890u_001:3160: tvadīya yoginā rūpa jñātavya tu katha priye |
XXn2890u_001:3164: bhagavatī cārādhitā kena yoginā vā bhaviṣyati ||
XXn2890u_001:3178: yāvad dhi dṛśyate loke strīrūpa bhuvanatraye |
XXn2890u_001:3182: tan madīya mata rūpa nīcānīcakula gata ||
XXn2890u_001:3186: devī cāsurī caiva yakṣiṇī rākṣasī tathā |
XXn2890u_001:3210: vaṇijinī vāriṇī veśyā ca tariṇī carmakāriṇī ||
XXn2890u_001:3214: kulatriṇī hatriṇī ḍombī cāṇḍālī śavariṇī tathā |
XXn2890u_001:3230: kāpālinī śakhinī caiva varuḍinī ca kemālinī |
XXn2890u_001:3234: gopālī kāṇḍakārī ca kocinī ca śilākuṭī ||
XXn2890u_001:3251: mātā ca bhaginī bhāryā māmikā bhāgineyikā ||
XXn2890u_001:3255: khuṭṭikā ca svasā caiva anyā ca sarvajātinī |
XXn2890u_001:3259: vratinī yoginī caiva raṇḍā cāpi tapasvinī ||
XXn2890u_001:3287: striyaḥ svargaḥ striyo dharmaḥ striya eva para
XXn2890u_001:3301: nīlavarṇā tu yā nārī dveṣavajrīti kīrtitā ||
XXn2890u_001:3305: śvetagaurā tu yā nārī mohavajrī hi sā matā |
XXn2890u_001:3309: pītavarṇā tu yā nārī sā devī piśunavajrikā ||
XXn2890u_001:3313: raktagaurā tu yā nārī rāgavajrī prakīrtitā |
XXn2890u_001:3317: śyāmavarṇā tu yā nārī īrṣyāvajrīti kathyate ||
XXn2890u_001:3354: tenāha pūjitā tuṣṭā sarvasiddhi dadāmi ca |
XXn2890u_001:3358: sarvastrīdeharūpan tu tyaktvā nānyā bhavāmy aha ||
XXn2890u_001:3362: tyaktvā strīpūjana nānyan madīya syāt prapūjana |
XXn2890u_001:3370: sarvatra sarvadā nitya tasya dṛṣṭipatha gatā |
XXn2890u_001:3386: caurīm api yadā kuryād yadi vā prāṇimāraṇa |
XXn2890u_001:3402: nakhena cūrṇayed yūkā vastrasthām api mārayet |
XXn2890u_001:3410: na kuryāc ca bhaya pāpe nārakādau ca durgatau |
XXn2890u_001:3414: bhaya kuryāt tu lokasya [ tā ] vac chaktir na labhyate ||
XXn2890u_001:3418: na pāpa vidyate kiñcid na puṇya kiñcid asti hi | ( 36 )
XXn2890u_001:3435: cittamātra yataḥ sarva kṣaṇamātrañ ca tatsthitiḥ |
XXn2890u_001:3439: naraka gacchate ko'sau svarga prayāti hi ||
XXn2890u_001:3459: tacchede ca pacet so'pi na bodhipadam aśnute |
XXn2890u_001:3463: tasmāt sarva parityajya mām evārādhayed vratī ||
XXn2890u_001:3484: kimākāro bhavec caṇḍas tasya siddhis tu kīdṛsī |
XXn2890u_001:3503: caṇḍāś ca sarva evaite yoginyā tu mayoditāḥ |
XXn2890u_001:3507: nīlavarṇas tu yo bhartā sa ca nīlācalaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
XXn2890u_001:3511: śvetagauro hi yo bhartā sa śvetācalasajñakaḥ |
XXn2890u_001:3515: pītavarṇo hi yo bhartā sa khyātaḥ pītakācalaḥ || ( 37 )
XXn2890u_001:3528: raktagauro hi yo bhartā sa raktācala udāhṛtaḥ |
XXn2890u_001:3532: śyāmavarṇo hi yo bhartā sa khyātaḥ śyāmakācalaḥ ||
XXn2890u_001:3536: eka eva bhavec caṇḍaḥ pañcarūpena sasthitaḥ |
